detail_desc: A-line, pleated dress in airy chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short butterfly sleeves. Lined.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with reversible sequins on the top, a lightly padded top edge, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Adjustable, lace-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Biker boots in imitation leather with a concealed zip in one side and decorative tabs and metal buckles. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in soft, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Joggers in imitation leather. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal front pockets, and covered elastication at the hems.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and a collar with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a seam centre front and a twisted detail at the hem.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Low-cut neckline front and back, wide shoulder straps, decorative buttons at the front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, turtle neck and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.

Waist bag in imitation leather with a rubber-like finish. Two-way zip at the front with a removable zip pull and carabiner hook. One zipped outer compartment, two inner compartments and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Size approx. 5x17x30 cm.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and wrapover front and back. Narrow ties that fasten at one side. Lined skirt.
Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a smocked section over the bust and wide, straight legs.
Suede slides with a bow at the front, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a sheen. V-neck wrapover bodice and a lined skirt.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in imitation leather with a collar, rounded notch lapels and shoulder tabs. Storm flap with a button and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab and buckle at the cuffs, diagonal welt pockets at the sides, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Large scarf in a soft, rib-knit wool blend.
Fitted calf-length dress in crêpe jersey with gathers and draping at the top, long sleeves, a concealed zip in the side and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, buttons at the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short V-neck dress in woven fabric with a shimmering metallic finish. Concealed zip at the back, long, wide sleeves with ribbing and a zip at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and shaping seams front and back. Unlined.

Outdoor jacket in a printed weave with a lined, detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Elasticated drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Boxy-style jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a fully-fashioned section at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist, and a lace pattern at the knees.
Fine-knit gloves with matching fingerless gloves. The fingerless gloves have a motif on the uppers. The gloves can be worn over each other or separately.
Set with a hat and mittens in soft fleece. Hat with a print motif on the front, appliqués at the top and ear flaps. Mittens with a print motif and appliqués on the top and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back, a high waist with pleats and a narrow tie belt, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hairband woven in a soft cotton blend with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Long, halterneck dress in jersey. Deep V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and a slit at the front. Partly lined in jersey.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a double-layered frill around the neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication and a double-layered frill trim at the hems. Buttons down the front made of shells that are decorative at the top and functional at the bottom. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Some of the cotton content of the jeans is recycled.
Vest top in cotton jersey.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slightly wider legs.
Swimming goggles with plastic frames, tinted lenses and an adjustable, multicoloured silicone strap at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fancy dress cape in jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
Fabric-covered plastic Alice bands with a fixed bow on top.
Dungarees in stretch twill with a zipped chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and back pockets. Fake fly, a zip in one side and slim legs with a zip at the hems.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a pair of trousers and long-sleeved top in a double layer of organic cotton jersey. Top with a button at the neck and sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Trousers with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted, ribbed vest top with a trim around the neckline and racer back. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, decorative seams front and back and short cap sleeves.

Rectangular shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a short shoulder strap attached by chain and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Flap with a magnetic press-stud and a zipped inner compartment. Satin lining. Depth 4 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 25.5 cm.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a deep neckline front and back and short sleeves.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a collar, button placket and rounded hem.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a detachable, pile-lined hood with imitation leather details and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a padded collar and a zip with a chin guard and grosgrain zip tab with a text print. Front pockets with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder.
Hair elastic with plastic beads.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Top in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long, 5-pocket denim shorts with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and slim legs.
Hat in soft, fine-knit wool with a roll-edge hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Set of three different shades of peel-off nail polish. 3x5 ml. Easy to remove – no nail polish remover required.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with ties at the back of the neck and a high cut at the back..
Metal hair clip decorated with a large bow in soft velvet.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and adjustable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar and a detachable hood with a print motif and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable strap at the back and matching handkerchief in woven fabric. Width of bow tie 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 30x30 cm.
Short skirt in a recycled wool and recycled polyester weave with a brushed finish. High waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, bib front and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in thin, printed cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.

Hi-top trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jersey pyjamas. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
